thread.title: Ground News - 2 adults, 2 children injured in Mount Pleasant fire
thread.title_full: Ground News - 2 adults, 2 children injured in Mount Pleasant fire

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - 2 adults, 2 children injured in Mount Pleasant fire
text:
Summary by Ground News Mt. Pleasant firefighters were called to the 1100 block of East Michigan Street at 5:44 p.m. Wednesday. Firefighters found fire coming out one window and heavy smoke coming from the eaves of the structure. Nobody was injured in the fire, which caused heavy fire, smoke and heat damage to the room where it started. Share menu More
Filters 2 Articles 2 Articles All Left Center Right
WCBD Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Nexstar Media Group 2 adults, 2 children injured in Mount Pleasant fire MOUNT PLEASANT, S.C. (WCBD) – Fire crews responded to a fire in the 1400 block of Venning Road in Mount Pleasant Thursday morning. When units arrived, they discovered a small single-story home fully on fire. First responders saved two adults and two children from the flames. The adults rescued were taken to the Medical University of South Carolina (MUSC), and the children were taken to MUSC Children’s Hospital. Both the adults and children have …
